Row.Text: Have two Settlements with at least two [B]Mountains[/B] each. Have two Settlements on [B]Tundra[/B].
[B]Mountains[/B] and [B]Tundra Settlements[/B] were an important part of the [B]Swiss Confederacy's[/B] identity.
The [B]Swiss Confederacy[/B] influenced the development of [B]Prussia[/B].
